title: Hypercontext (YC S21) Is Hiring a Senior Software Engineer
description:
We are looking for a passionate and talented individual to join the team as a Senior Backend Software Engineer. This is a remote engineering position, reporting into an Engineering Manager and working in eastern standard time (+/- 3 hours). If you develop clean, concise and performant code, thrive in a team environment, hold yourself to the highest standards of integrity, and want to make a serious impact at a scrappy tech company, then Hypercontext is the place for you!

What you’ll be doing 
- Building the backend for various user-facing features, working closely with the front-end and integration teams to spec, test, deploy and iterate.
- Improving existing services to deliver a consistent and performant user experience
- Scaling services via architectural recommendations and changes
- Providing deep and thoughtful code reviews of backend pull requests
- Improving existing engineering policies and standards

Requirements:
- 4+ years experience working professionally in web app development
- Academic background in Computer Science or related field (BSc or MSc)
- Object oriented programming experience and knowledge of MVC design patterns
- Experience investigating and improving web applications for performance and reliability issues
- Experience scaling services to handle high throughput and consistent data delivery

Great to haves:
- Experience with databases (Relational or NoSQL)
- Experience with PHP Laravel or Symfony
- Experience developing at other startups
- Experience with build tools
- Familiarity with Agile Development, Testing and Continuous Integration

Why work with us?
- Be part of a fun, dynamic, and collaborative team.
- Work with a team of high quality developers in a fast paced agile environment, where every feature you build significantly benefits the company and customers
- We’re all about making work awesome for our customers, and we try every day to make that a reality at our office too
- Have tons of autonomy and responsibilities - the only thing that matters are results
- Healthy work life balance
- Competitive salary, huge potential for professional growth, flexible work hours, company outings, retreats and clubs, and paid vacation 

Apply with a resume, github account name, and links to your work online.
